name: Jonathan Joestar
japaneseName: ジョナサン・ジョースター
catchphrase: You're next line is...

name: Dio Brando
catchphrase: WRYYYYY

name: Erina Pendleton
japaneseName: エリナ・ペンドルトン・ジョースター
catchphrase: I'm happy that the noble Jonathan Joestar is here in my arms!

name: Will Anthonio Zeppeli
catchphrase: What is "courage"? "Courage" is knowing fear and making that fear your own!

name: Robert E. O. Speedwagon
japaneseName: ロバート・E・O・スピードワゴン
catchphrase: UWHOOAH?!

name: Tarkus
catchphrase: Let me hear your cries of despair! I'm an elite at slaughter! I create death and destruction by force!

name: Bruford
catchphrase: Hehe...This pain is proof of life. If you feel pain, you can feel joy... That's what humanity means...

name: Straizo
catchphrase: I, Straizo will not forgive you!

name: Dire
catchphrase: You fell for it, fool! Thunder Cross Split Attack!

name: Joseph Joestar
japaneseName: ジョセフ・ジョースター
catchphrase: You're next line is...

name: Caesar Anthonoio Zeppeli
japaneseName: シーザー・アントニオ・ツェペリ
catchphrase: Jojo, this is my last Ripple! Take it!

name: Lisa Lisa
catchphrase: Hey the big guy on the left, I don't like your face. I'm gonna have to hurt you.

name: Rudol von Stroheim
japaneseName: ルドル・フォン・シュトロハイム
catchphrase: German science is the greatest in the world!

name: Kars
catchphrase: It seems I, Kars, am the only one left...but only one can stand at the top!

name: Esidisi
catchphrase: I am "Esidisi of the Flame"! My Mode controls heat!

name: Wamuu
catchphrase: You beat me, JoJo. And as a warrior, it appears you stand taller than I do.

name: Santana
catchphrase: Give it up, you primitive beings.

name: Jotaro Kujo
catchphrase: What a pain...(やれやれだぜ)

name: Muhammad Avdol
japaneseName: モハメド・アヴドゥル
catchphrase: Hell 2 U!

name: Noriaki Kakyoin
catchphrase: Rerorerorerorerorerorero.

name: Jean Pierre Polnareff
japaneseName: ジャン・ピエール・ポルナレフ
catchphrase: I'm gonna turn you into a pincushion!

name: Iggy
catchphrase: I guess I don't have the heart to abandon a kid who likes dogs!

name: Enya the Hag
catchphrase: Just one little wound is all I need...then "Justice" will do the rest!

name: Vanilla Ice (Cool Ice)
catchphrase: One by one, each of you shall fall in line, as I scatter your atomic fragments across the deepest recesses of the void.

name: Hol Horse
catchphrase: "Better to be No.2 than No.1", that's my motto!

name: J. Geil
catchphrase: Ku ku ku ku ku.... You really did waste your youth trying to hunt me down... but it looks like you won't succeed! What a pathetic life you've lived!

name: Daniel J. D'Arby
japaneseName: ダニエル・J・ダービー
catchphrase: GOOD.

name: Terence T. D'Arby
japaneseName: テレンス・T.・ダービー
catchphrase: Are you going to do the "ORA ORA" thing?!

name: N'Doul
catchphrase: I do not fear death, but I don't want to be killed by that man... evil needs a savior as well...

name: Mariah
catchphrase: Boys always want to touch things they aren't supposed to.

name: Alessi
catchphrase: Attaboy...

name: Oingo (Zenyatta)
catchphrase: Our cards are the god of knowledge Tohth, and the god of creation Khnum! We are the Oingo Boingo brothers!

name: Boingo (Mondatta)
catchphrase: My Stand Tohth's predictions are always right!

name: Anubis
catchphrase: When I fight against someone, I never lose!

name: Gray Fly
catchphrase: I'm planning on doing one hell of a... MASSACRE!

name: Imposter Captain Tennille
japaneseName: 偽キャプテン・テニール
catchphrase: Troublesome waters! Lies and betrayal! It represents the fear of the unknown: the card of the moon, Dark Blue Moon!

name: Devo (Soul Sacrifice)
catchphrase: I am Devo the Cursed. And my Stand represents "The Devil" of the Major Arcana... It symbolizes confusion and misfortune.

name: Rubber Soul
catchphrase: DO - YOU - UNDERSTANDDDD!?

name: Nena
catchphrase: I am the "Empress", old man!  And you Joseph will be the first to die!!!

name: ZZ
catchphrase: Wheel of Fortune is gonna grind you into hamburgers and splatter you all over these rocks!!

name: Steely Dan
japaneseName: 鋼入りの（スティーリー）ダン
catchphrase: My name is Dan... Steely Dan. My Stand is represented by the card of "The Lovers".

name: Mannish Boy
catchphrase: Although I still crap in diapers, I'm still smarter than you jokers combined!! LALI-HO!!

name: Cameo
catchphrase: Hail 2U!

name: Midler
catchphrase: Jotaro, you're my kind of guy... I regret that I have to destroy you...

name: Josuke Higashikata
catchphrase: This is great! (グレートだぜ! Gurēto daze)

name: Tomoko Higashikata
catchphrase: I hope Josuke's behaving himself. He just got into high school. I really don't get that brat sometimes. But, he is really tender and gentle deep down, so I guess I shouldn't worry so much.

name: Okuyasu Nijimura
catchphrase: I'm not that smart, okay? I just do what my heart tells me to do.

name: Keicho Nijimura
catchphrase: My plans are on a level beyond your comprehension. Just you wait, in the end, it will all go according to my plan.

name: Koichi Hirose
catchphrase: In case you're wondering, my name is Koichi Hirose (though I guess it's not that important). Anyway, I was nervously walking myself to class... until I met those two really strange guys.

name: Rohan Kishibe
catchphrase: Reality is the lifeblood that makes a work pulse with energy. Reality itself is entertainment!

name: Reimi Sugimoto
catchphrase: If my killer is caught, Morioh will finally stop being the playground of this maniac and go back to normal. We must stop this monster as soon as we can!

name: Shigekiyo Yangu
japaneseName: 矢安宮 重清(重ちー)
catchphrase: As long as ya'll be with me, my little Harvests, I'll never run outta money...for my whole life!

name: Mikitaka Hazekura
catchphrase: "Alien"? Yes, that is the term. I am an alien!

name: Yukako Yamagishi
catchphrase: It doesn't matter if anyone comes, because love is invincible.

name: Yuya Fungami
catchphrase: I am... just so gloriously handsome! Check out this face of mine.

name: Toshikazu Hazamada
catchphrase: I finally got this so-called "Stand" ability...not everyone gets to have one, you know? Kinda makes you want to live a more dangerous and successful life than the average guy, don't you think?

name: Tonio Trussardi
japaneseName: トニオ・トラサルディー
catchphrase: Now, let's continue with the meal, shall we?

name: Aya Tsuji
catchphrase: I didn't open this salon for the money. It's because I wanted to make people happy like the fairy godmother in Cinderella.

name: Yoshikage Kira
catchphrase: I want a peaceful life. It's just that it's in my nature to kill.

name: Yoshihiro Kira
catchphrase: I will kill anyone who harms my beloved son!

name: Akira Otoishi
catchphrase: In the near future, with this baby right here, I'm gonna BLOW THE WHOLE WORLD AWAY!

name: Anjuro "Angelo" Katagiri
catchphrase: Today, tomorrow, whenever, I'll wait patiently for my chance. Then, I'll kill you and your hot mom!

name: Bug-Eaten
catchphrase: Skwiiiiiiiiieck

name: Ken Oyanagi
catchphrase: Hey, mister. Wanna play rock-paper-scissors?

name: Toyohiro Kanedaichi
catchphrase: I see, so you were curious about my house?

name: Terunosuke Miyamoto
catchphrase: When I find your terror's tells, my Enigma can strike perfectly!

name: Masazo Kinoto
catchphrase: I hate it when people see my back!

name: Tamami Kobayashi
catchphrase: You feel "guilty," right?

name: Giorno Giovanna
japaneseName: ジョルノ・ジョバァーナ
catchphrase: I, Giorno Giovanna, have a dream.

name: Bruno Bucciarati
japaneseName: ブローノ・ブチャラティ
catchphrase: This taste...is the taste of a liar!

name: Leone Abbacchio
japaneseName: レオーネ・アバッキオ
catchphrase: I'll use my Stand to solve the mystery!

name: Guido Mista
catchphrase: We'll end it right here, right now. Time to bust a cap in his mouth!

name: Narancia Ghirga
catchphrase: Volare Via!

name: Pannacotta Fugo
japaneseName: パンナコッタ・フーゴ
catchphrase: You stupid delinquent! Are you messing with me!? How many times do I have to teach you this before you learn?! You just said six times five was thirty, so why the hell is your answer even less?! YOU SHIT-FOR-BRAINS!!

name: Trish Una
catchphrase: I, too... can overcome... the fate I inherited from you... I will not cower or flee! If you try to stop me... I shall soar beyond you.

name: Silver Chariot Requiem
japaneseName: チャリオッツ・レクイエム

name: Diavolo
catchphrase: I am an emperor! My only goal is to remain at the top!

name: Vinegar Doppio
japaneseName: ヴィネガー・ドッピオ
catchphrase: Bring, ring, ring, ring, ring...

name: Squalo and Tiziano
japaneseName: スクアーロ & ティッツァーノ
catchphrase: I won't leave even a scrap of him behind, and I'll kill every last member of his team... I'll rip them to pieces and make them pay for what they've done!

name: Cioccolata
catchphrase: Let me see the look on your face at the moment your hope burns out... and your life reaches its end! Show me your despair as you fall!

name: Secco
catchphrase: Oh! Almost forgot! Gotta get it on video...Won't take long to kill you, though...

name: Polpo
catchphrase: Compared to trust, someone being smart or talented is as significant as this piece of chewed-up cracker scum between my teeth...

name: Mario Zucchero
catchphrase: I'm the one doin' the talking here! I'm the one in control!

name: Sale
catchphrase: If I go all out with my Stand, Kraft Work, it ain't a challenge for me to swat your bullets down.

name: Risotto Nero
catchphrase: I can't wait! I can't wait to see the look on your face as you die! I win! I'll send your head flying!

name: Formaggio
catchphrase: "It can't be helped" (しょう が ねえなあ---つ)

name: Illuso
catchphrase: I stand secure and unmatched inside the mirror.

name: Prosciutto
catchphrase: When we truly think "I'll kill you!" from the bottom of our hearts... by that time, the deed has already been done!

name: Pesci
catchphrase: Before Big Brother's life leaves his body... I'll make you pay before his very eyes!!

name: Melone
catchphrase: Di molto!

name: Ghiaccio
catchphrase: Even roaring train engines, even the raging seas will come to a grinding halt at my command! None can defy my whims!

name: Scolippi
catchphrase: We are all slaves of fate. That is the meaning of my ability, Rolling Stones.

name: Jolyne Kujo
catchphrase: Gimme a break! (やれやれだわ Yare Yare Dawa)

name: Ermes Costello
japaneseName: エルメェス・コステロ
catchphrase: "Revenge" is for settling your score with your own destiny!

name: Emporio Alniño
japaneseName: エンポリオ・アルニーニョ
catchphrase: Don't you see it? You lost to your own "fate". Walking the path of "Justice" is true "Fate"!

name: Foo Fighters (F.F.)
catchphrase: Look at me Jolyne. This is my "spirit"... This is my "intellect"... I was alive.

name: Narciso Anasui
catchphrase: I love you... I've been dying to come here for you...

name: Weather Report (Weather Forecast)
catchphrase: I'm going to be the one to kill Pucci. And after I kill him, kill me. Understand?

name: Gwess
catchphrase: Even though I said you can't speak, you can still say cute things. Like "I wanna walk", "I'm hungry", and "Good night". Got it?

name: Donatello Versus
japaneseName: ドナテロ・ヴェルサス
catchphrase: I can't die here! I have a right to be happy!

name: Rikiel
catchphrase: I overcame my own heart! I'll never panic again... I'm going to reclaim my life, with my own hands! I'm Apollo !!!

name: Ungalo
catchphrase: All I've done 'til now is wander around aimlessly, just sinking lower and lower without knowing why...but now I get it! I existed for this "ability"!

name: Johngalli A
catchphrase: Meteorologists say the wind's movements are unpredictable. They have a point. But the wind isn't completely unreadable.

name: Sports Maxx
catchphrase: Listen... I'm gonna go ahead and suck your brains out, right now... And even if I rip out all the shit in your stomach and fill your empty skull with it, I won't be satisfied!!

name: Miuccia Miuller (Miu Miu)
japaneseName: ミューミューミュッチャー・ミューラー
catchphrase: There's no one who can escape my Jail House Lock!!!

name: Miraschon
catchphrase: My name is Miraschon, prisoner number FE26789. You're at 87 throws, right? Your little game of catch, I'm willing to bet that it won't last 100 throws...

name: Lang Rangler
catchphrase: I'm gonna carve your f*ckin epitaph on your pretty white skin!

name: Kenzou
catchphrase: You there! Do you want to drown too?

name: D an G
catchphrase: No one told me that this would happen... My job was supposed to be simple... "Kill Jolyne Cujoh". That's what I was told, and that's what I'm gonna do...

name: Guccio
catchphrase: I don't know what you're talking about... Hahh, hahh... My name is Guccio... I... just don't want to become a plant... Please, I'm so scared...

name: Viviano Westwood
japaneseName: ヴィヴァーノ・ウエストウッド
catchphrase: I'm gonna release my fury, I'm gonna snap and release everything I've got! I'm gonna release it, release it, release it! I'm the strongest!

name: Thunder McQueen
japaneseName: サンダー・マックイイーン
catchphrase: I feel like dying.

name: Johnny Joestar
japaneseName: ジョニィ・ジョースター
catchphrase: It has, truly, been a roundabout path...

name: Gyro Zeppeli
catchphrase: Nyo ho ho ho~

name: Lucy Steel
japaneseName: ルーシー・スティール
catchphrase: If you're going to plan a race, it should be across the entire American continent! And the winnings should be huge! Like, $50,000,000! Real dreams should be that big!

name: Steven Steel
japaneseName: スティーブン・スティール
catchphrase: There is no such thing as failure in this race! There are only adventurers!

name: Hot Pants
catchphrase: The only thing that can soothe and cleanse my "sin" is that corpse...

name: Mountain Tim
catchphrase: I was never expecting to die on a bed. I'm a cowboy. All I wanted was a place to come home to... just a place to return to after my journeys...

name: Diego "Dio" Brando
japaneseName: ディエゴ・ブランドー
catchphrase: I will stand above that flock of pigeons and I will control them.

name: Wekapipo
catchphrase: One step! It seems that I am one step "ahead" of you.

name: Magent Magent
japaneseName: マジェント・マジェント
catchphrase: I'm gonna have to teach you that people who don't have anythin' to lose are the scariest types, Mr. Smartass!

name: Pocoloco
catchphrase: Pocoloco is the lucky guy after all!

name: Funny Valentine
japaneseName: ファニー・ヴァレンタイン
catchphrase: My heart and actions are utterly unclouded. They are all those of "Justice".

name: Blackmore
catchphrase: Scuse me (すいませェん Suimasēn)

name: Mike O.
catchphrase: Your sentence to torture is now repealed! Now! Immediately! You are to be executed!

name: Ringo Roadagain
japaneseName: リンゴォ・ロードアゲイン
catchphrase: Welcome to the True Man's World...

name: Axl RO
catchphrase: People must sacrifice something in order to advance.

name: Dr. Ferdinand
japaneseName: フェルディナンド博士
catchphrase: "Respect" is "Prosperity"!

name: D-I-S-C-O
catchphrase: "Chocolate Disco." That's all I'm going to say.

name: Pork Pie Hat Kid
japaneseName: ポーク・パイ・ハット小僧

name: Sandman
catchphrase: I'll cross the continent and win with my feet alone.

name: Benjamin Boom Boom
japaneseName: ベンジャミン・ブンブーン
catchphrase: Shaddup, you idiot! Men don't cry!

name: Andre Boom Boom
japaneseName: アンドレ・ブンブーン
catchphrase: D...Don't shoot! I mean no harm! I came here because I saw the fire!

name: L.A. Boom Boom
catchphrase: How dare you do that to Daddy! How dare you! I'll tear through your arteries!

name: Mrs. Robinson
catchphrase: Take this! I will not allow anyone in this race to run ahead of me!

name: Oyecomova
catchphrase: My skill with explosives has become a special ability... I take this as a mission from God!

name: Sugar Mountain
japaneseName: シュガー・マウンテン
catchphrase: Those who are willing to lose... they're the ones who ultimately gain everything.

name: Jesus
catchphrase: If your heart is wavering, do not shoot; Because then a new path will be open for you.

name: Josuke Higashikata (Fusion)
catchphrase: Who the hell am I?

name: Yasuho Hirose
catchphrase: Finding those traces and going! Progressing beyond! That is my Stand... Paisley Park.

name: Rai Mamezuku
catchphrase: I know I sound like a broken record but 89 YEARS OLD?!

name: Joshu Higashikata
catchphrase: But I... don't even have that kind of talent, do I...? Even if it's just a little... I have something, right?

name: Tsurugi Higashikata
catchphrase: What do you need to be happy?

name: Norisuke Higashikata IV
catchphrase: Everything here has a natural "flow". Now "flow" is a metaphor, but if you don't fight it, you'll definitely reach your goal.

name: Kaato Higashikata
catchphrase: I don't have any regrets, but... That's because I'm going to take back the life I lost.

name: Daiya Higashikata
catchphrase: Happiness is to share memories with someone.

name: Hato Higashikata
catchphrase: Oh, my! Someone dropped a magazine with such a pretty girl on the cover in a place like this?! Gee, I'm sure I've seen this person before some~~where... It's me~ muhuhuhuhu!

name: Jobin Higashikata
catchphrase: This world, including Morioh, is crazy. And the one thing you can be certain of in this mad world... Is the one that wins is the one in the right.

name: Mitsuba Higashikata
catchphrase: You want to mediate and "smooth things over"...? Don't spout that nonsense to me ! If you ever...lay a finger on Tsurugi without justifiable grounds again, I'll break those fingers without a second thought.

name: Kei Nijimura
catchphrase: You are you...I know that...It's the same for everyone in this world...you are your own self.

name: Yoshikage Kira
catchphrase: I'm going to steal one...one of those fruits...

name: Josefumi Kujo
catchphrase: If I can be even a little help to Holy.....That's my precious image of happiness.

name: Karera Sakunami
catchphrase: Living your life so your now is a treasured, fun, wonderful experience...that's happiness.

name: Tamaki Damo
catchphrase: Do not underestimate me.

name: Yotsuyu Yagiyama
catchphrase: I Am a Rock. I am an Island.

name: Aisho Dainenjiyama
catchphrase: It is quite an unfortunate thing that's happened to you...

name: A. Phex Brothers
japaneseName: エイ・フェックス兄弟
abilities: Schott Key No.1 and Schott Key No.2
catchphrase: How far are you gonna go? Until he tells us who he is...? Until he's a corpse. Do what you have to do, that's what matters here.

name: Dolomite
catchphrase: The Blue Lagoon... Man, I'd love to really go there. That's my dream...

name: Urban Guerrilla
japaneseName: アーバン・ゲリラ, 下里 良
catchphrase: You people... when you got careless, you ended up being forever below the rocks... the Rock Humans that is!

name: Poor Tom
catchphrase: These loose women, what'm I gonna do~

name: Wu Tomoki
catchphrase: Wu Tomoki does not fail.

name: Satoru Akefu
catchphrase: Whomever it may be, they would be always better off without pursuing me...

name: Tooru
catchphrase: Yasuho-chan, it looks like we ran into each other at a good time... Seems that's always the way with us...

name: Ojiro Sasame
catchphrase: I'm fresh outta business cards but the name's Ojiro, nice ta meetcha.
